[[exercise_refactoring2"> === Extract method
A useful refactoring is to mark code and create a method from the selected code. To use this in this exercise, mark the coding of the "for" loop, right click on the selection and select menu:Refactoring [Extract Method] . Use _calculateSum_ as the name of the new method.

[[exercise_refactoring3"> === Extract Constant
You can also extract strings and create constants based on the strings. Mark for this example the "Hello Eclipse!" string in your source code, right-click on it and select menu:Refactor[Extract Constant] . Name your new constant HELLO.
Extract Constants,pdfwidth=60%]
The string is now defined as a constant.
